original_title: Πέφτουν οι σφαίρες σαν το χαλάζι κι ο τραυματισμένος καλλιτέχνης αναστενάζει
overview: A sarcastic, improvisational film, with anarchic origins, strongly cinephile flavor, and largely autobiographical in nature and content. A film director strives to escape alienation, while, at the same time, expressing his intense feelings for his wife, cinema and Greece during the restoration of democracy.
title: A Hail of Bullets
